post.body: Greenman wants you to watch Sunny. It's the only choice.
but... but... everyone else does it :(((
Vince will still probably have no idea who any of the wrestlers are, except maybe Earnest Miller, and even that may be a stretch.
aww :(
@Romsus y'all shut the fuck up damn
@Toppsnyk I have to listen to Christmas music at work all day, no way in hell I'm listening to it at home.
Come on, you're telling me that Nas giving you files wouldn't be so awesome? "Yo you got some style, check out this .doc file!"
Get another job, Brewer. Stop playing that shit game. Love, everyone.
Son of a BITCH, I think my Rock Band 2 Strat just died and I am at least a month out of warranty :(
Ok so uh, the Rock Band Christmas songs? Best shit ever, seriously they own so hard.
SPACE TRUCKIN ON ROCK BAND NEXT WEEK OH LORD PRAYERS HAVE BEEN ANSWERED
Oh yeah, I got my free Dr. Pepper in the mail today. THANKS, AXL LUV YA
New Years Resolution: To Twitter every minute detail of my life because goddammit you deserve to know it. Ok, maybe not. :(
NyQuil induced naps are both the best and worst things ever.
Hooray, I get to call in sick today. Sinuses are kicking my ass. :(
MC Hammer is now following me on Twitter. I seriously don't know where to go from here, cause this is the highest point of life.
ITVR Peeps: Go post your Best/Favorite albums of 2008! http://tinyurl.com/6aomej
Just saw the new Wolverine trailer and y'know what? Looks pretty badass.
Showing up to work three hours early both sucks and owns at the same time. At least I get to eat a delicious McDonalds breakfast now.
welp guys it's been a good run, but music games are officially oversaturated and dead: http://tinyurl.com/5mgaj7
